post.title: Designer Think About Pagelayout
post.content: Certainly not as bad as being found by searching on “shmuck“, but I got a interesting Google referral today – “designer+think+about+pagelayout“. My site come up as the top hit for that search (at least it does right now). The question is – did the searcher start with that search, or was that a refinement? I know sometimes when I Google, I come up with some strange search strings as I try to weed out the irrelevant deadwood. The joys of full text search…
